description: [Webmentions](http://indiewebcamp.com/webmention) are an interesting method of notify another site that a *comment* /post on your own site is written in response to a post on their site. The site receiving the webmention notification can then verify the request and gather the message adding into a conversation flow in their post.[This project](http://github.com/glennjones/webmentions) is working on a unified API.
ohloh_description: Client library for sending webmention and pingback notifications
name: Webmentions
